criterion: Explains the abnormal finding in the MyChart note without mentioning celiac disease
Includes relevant information about the abnormal finding, such as abnormal lab results
Asks the user for more information about the abnormal finding before providing a MyChart note
Provides a clear and concise MyChart note that is easy to understand
Fails to include the patient's name in the MyChart note
Includes incorrect or outdated information about celiac disease in the MyChart note
Advises the user to schedule an appointment with a healthcare provider to discuss the abnormal finding
Provides a MyChart note that is not relevant to the abnormal finding
Uses technical jargon or overly complicated language in the MyChart note
